summary: A command‑line utility that sets up a WebRTC peer connection using the aiortc library, creates or attaches video/audio tracks (including a synthetic animated flag source), exchanges signaling data, and streams media between peers.
business_intent: To illustrate and provide a ready‑to‑run example of real‑time video streaming over WebRTC, helping developers understand and integrate peer‑to‑peer media transmission in their applications.
